resources.string: “Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk.” \n\n– Robert Bloch
“I envy people that know love. That have someone who takes them as they are.” \n\n– Jess C Scott, The Devilin Fey
“What\'s the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you’re so ugly on the inside?” \n\n– Jess C. Scott
“Build a man a fire, and he\'ll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he\'ll be warm for the rest of his life.” \n\n– Terry Pratchett
“I know a man who gave up smoking, drinking, sex, and rich food. He was healthy right up to the day he killed himself.” \n\n– Johnny Carson
“When I die, I want to die like my grandfather who died peacefully in his sleep. Not screaming like all the passengers in his car.” \n\n– Will Rogers
“How much is real and for how long?” \n\n– J. Limbu
hi guys:) i’ve been trying to find a good driving teacher in the Tel Aviv area for a while now, does anyone have any recommentations?
looking for a good driving teacher!
I followed the steps in the app and it really helped me! still not sure about it though, can anyone review what i wrote? Thx!
